attributes.action: Sack Catriona Ruane for being incompetent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
She is going to destroy one of the best education systems in the UK, for lord only knows what reasons.
She appears to want an education system, that will favour rich parents.

All those who think she should be sacked, vote here.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
